titles.title: A joint resolution to call for the removal of United States Armed Forces from Honduras.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Arms Control, International Security and Science.
Referred to Subcommittee on Western Hemisphere Affairs.

committee.subcommittee: Arms Control, International Security and Science
committee.name: House Foreign Affairs

bill.summary: 3/21/1988--Introduced. Determines that the requirements of the War Powers Resolution have become operative. Calls for the removal of U.S. armed forces from Honduras within 60 days after enactment of this Act unless the Congress declares war or extends such 60-day period.
